metadata.title: CVE-2021-46918 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: idxd: clear MSIX permission entry on shutdown Adddisabling/clearing of MSIX permission entries on device shutdown to mirrorthe enabling of the MSIX entries on probe. Current code left the MSIXenabled and the pasid entries still programmed at device shutdown.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
